=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 6 hours -
12 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 4 hours -
8 hours || 48 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 40 mins -
5 hours 20 mins || 32 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
